1. Who was reinstated to his seat in the Tennessee House?
Justin Jones
2. Where is Justin Jones from?
Nashville
3. Who is the other expelled lawmaker?
Justin Pearson
4. Where is Justin Pearson from?
Memphis
5. Why were the two lawmakers expelled?
For protesting for gun control
6. What event sparked the protest?
A deadly Nashville school shooting at the Covenant School
7. Who survived the expulsion vote by a single vote?
Democratic Rep. Gloria Johnson
8. What did President Joe Biden say about the expulsion of the lawmakers?
The expulsion of lawmakers who engaged in peaceful protest is shocking, undemocratic, and unprecedented.
9. What was the response of House Speaker Cameron Sexton?
He tried to compare the lawmakers' actions to those of the Jan. 6 rioters at the US Capitol.
10. Were the protesters in the Tennessee capitol allowed in the building after security screening?
Yes
